title: New: Yuno – Thingamajig
body:
The most confusing name in music is no more, as **unouomedude** ditches the moniker under which he made his name (pronounced You Know You Owe Me Dude), taking up the far simpler yet just as effective **Yuno**.

New track _Thingamajig_ is an atmospheric take on his former sound, less centred around pop-hooks and playing to the subtle beat and repetitive nature of the track. **Yuno**, it’s good to have you back.
